document_data.caption: The Hand of [[Azuth]] directing adventurers to Watcher's Knoll.
document_data.name: Watcher's Knoll
document_data.mainbody: '''Watcher's Knoll''' was a good sized hill with a clearing at the top located in [[Shadowdale]]. The knoll could be found northeast of Shadowdale, in the forest.
document_data.Features:
A large stone pillar or plinth dominated the top of Watcher's Knoll. This plinth has been used as a watchtower, when necessary, from the time of Aencar the Mantled King.

Watcher's Knoll contained the [[Aumry's Tomb|burial site]] of [[Aumry]] and [[Syluné Silverhand]].
document_data.History: In [[1297 DR]] lord [[Joadath]] slew dozens of worshipers of [[Tyr]] atop Watcher's Knoll.
